itunes:title: Episode 080: Rita Wayword (feat. Jordan Blok)
title: Episode 080: Rita Wayword (feat. Jordan Blok)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 80 of CEREBRO, Connor and science writer Jordan Blok spin with Spiral, Mistress of the Wildways! Best known as Betsy Braddock's nemesis and Longshot's biggest hater, the wicked time-dancing sorceress was eventually revealed via retcon to be the tortured future self of a decidedly sympathetic character: Longshot's first love, the plucky human stuntwoman Ricochet Rita.

The CEREBRO character file on Spiral begins at 1:07:20.

(Content Advisory: Rita's story includes violence against animals, torture, brainwashing, pregnancy loss by another character, and lots of involuntary body modification.)

Thanks to ComiXology for sponsoring the pod! You can sign up for a free trial here.



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
